Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add subagent-test-driven-development skill

Manages test execution via test-runner subagents with incremental timeout escalation. Starts with 10s timeout and escalates \(20s→30s→45s→60s→90s→120s→180s→300s→600s max\) only as tests pass. Enforces 10-minute hard limit, verifies test inclusion, and requires user confirmation before expanding scope.

Key features:
- Incremental timeout strategy with 10 escalation levels
- Delegates to test-runner subagents \(never reads terminal directly\)
- Test inclusion verification after each successful pass
- User confirmation before adding out-of-scope tests
- Root cause investigation after 300s if tests keep timing out
- Rationalization table and red flags for common violations

Tested with TDD methodology \(RED-GREEN-REFACTOR\):
- RED: Established baseline showing agents calculate single "optimal" timeout
- GREEN: Skill enforces incremental escalation starting at 10s
- REFACTOR: Added counters for efficiency and auto-include rationalizations

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
